document.full_text: treating high-risk pregnant women with the hormone progesterone cut their rate of premature delivery by 45 percent and helped lower the risk of breathing complications in their babies, u.s. researchers said on wednesday.
document.title: simple treatment cuts preterm births by 45 percent
lines_and_colors: treating high-risk pregnant women with the hormone progesterone cut their rate of premature delivery by 45 percent and helped lower the risk of breathing complications in their babies, u.s. researchers said on wednesday.
